description: Deploys the system instance to the target specified in CreateSystemInstance. If the system or any workflows and entities have been updated before this action is called, then the deployment will create a new Amazon Simple Storage Service resource file and then deploy it. Since this action creates a Greengrass deployment on the caller's behalf, the calling identity must have write permissions to the specified Greengrass group. Otherwise, the call will fail with an authorization error. For information about the artifacts that get added to your Greengrass core device when you use this API, see AWS IoT Things Graph and AWS IoT Greengrass.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: The ID of the system instance. This value is returned by the CreateSystemInstance action. The ID should be in the following format. urn:tdm:REGION/ACCOUNT ID/default:deployment:DEPLOYMENTNAME.

nested_items.name: id
nested_items.description: The ID of the system instance.

nested_items.name: arn
nested_items.description: The ARN of the system instance.

nested_items.name: status
nested_items.description: The status of the system instance.

nested_items.name: target
nested_items.description: The target of the system instance.

nested_items.name: greengrassGroupName
nested_items.description: The ID of the Greengrass group where the system instance is deployed.

nested_items.name: createdAt
nested_items.description: The date when the system instance was created.

nested_items.name: updatedAt
nested_items.description: The date and time when the system instance was last updated.

nested_items.name: greengrassGroupId
nested_items.description: The ID of the Greengrass group where the system instance is deployed.

nested_items.name: greengrassGroupVersionId
nested_items.description: The version of the Greengrass group where the system instance is deployed.

nested_items.name: greengrassDeploymentId
nested_items.description: The ID of the Greengrass deployment used to deploy the system instance.
